AT.name: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™
AT.description: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™ ist eine innovative und interaktive Animation, die sich um den berühmten Spiel-Helden und seine glorreichen Eskapaden dreht. Pac-Man hat seinen eigenen Kopf und gerät deshalb immer wieder in Schwierigkeiten. Führe ihn also sicher zu seinem Ziel - sei es beim Zeitvertreib in der Spielhalle, beim Drachensteigen oder bei der Fahrt durch das Minenwerk. Dazu gibt es zwei komplette, klassische Pac-Man-Spiele zum Entdecken und Genießen: Das Original Arcade-Spiel Pac-Man™ und dessen Nachfolger, Ms. Pac-Man™. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™
AU.description: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™ is an innovative interactive cartoon centred around the classic game star and his hilarious escapades. However Pac-Man has a mind of his own, and is prone to wandering into danger, so make sure you guide him safely: whether you’re just hanging out in the arcade, hang-gliding or minecart riding! Also there are two full, classic Pac-Man games to discover and enjoy: the original arcade Pac-Man™ and its sequel Ms. Pac-Man™. This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™
BG.description: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™ is an innovative interactive cartoon centred around the classic game star and his hilarious escapades. However Pac-Man has a mind of his own, and is prone to wandering into danger, so make sure you guide him safely: whether you’re just hanging out in the arcade, hang-gliding or minecart riding! Also there are two full, classic Pac-Man games to discover and enjoy: the original arcade Pac-Man™ and its sequel Ms. Pac-Man™. This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™
BE.description: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™ est un dessin animé interactif innovant mettant en scène la star culte du jeu vidéo dans des aventures hilarantes. Mais attention : Pac-Man a un caractère bien à lui et une fâcheuse tendance à foncer droit sur le danger. Soyez prudent lorsque vous le guidez, que ce soit en traînant à la salle d'arcade, en faisant du deltaplane ou en montant à bord du train de la mine ! Contient également deux jeux cultes Pac-Man à découvrir : le jeu d'arcade original Pac-Man™ et sa suite, Ms. Pac-Man™. Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

ES.name: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™
ES.description: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™ es una innovadora animación interactiva que gira en torno al protagonista del juego clásico y sus hilarantes aventuras. Sin embargo, Pac-Man tiene sus propias ideas y es propenso a dirigirse hacia el peligro. ¡Intenta guiarlo con cuidado, ya estés en las recreativas, practicando el ala delta o conduciendo una vagoneta minera! También están disponibles otros dos títulos clásicos completos de Pac-Man para descubrir y disfrutar: el juego de arcade original, Pac-Man™, y su secuela, Ms. Pac-Man™. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

IT.name: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™
IT.description: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™ è un cartone animato interattivo incentrato sulla star dell'omonimo gioco classico e le sue spassose avventure. Tuttavia, Pac-Man decide per sé dove andare e ha la tendenza a cacciarsi nei guai, per cui dovrai fare attenzione e tenerlo d'occhio, sia in sala giochi, sia in deltaplano o sulle rotaie! Inoltre è possibile giocare ai due titoli classici completi di Pac-Man tutti da scoprire, ossia il gioco arcade originale Pac-Man™ e il suo sequel, Ms. Pac-Man™. Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

NL.name: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™
NL.description: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™ is een innovatieve, interactieve cartoon die helemaal om de klassieke gameheld en zijn hilarische streken draait. Pac-Man doet lekker wat hij zelf wilt en heeft de neiging om het gevaar tegemoet te wandelen. Doe dus je best om hem veilig te houden, waar je ook bent en wat je ook doet, of je nou rondhangt in de arcade, aan het zeilvliegen bent of in een mijnwagentje rijdt! Daarnaast zijn er twee volledige Pac-Man klassiekers die je kunt spelen: het oorspronkelijke Pac-Man™-spel uit de arcade en de opvolger Ms. Pac-Man™. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™
NZ.description: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™ is an innovative interactive cartoon centred around the classic game star and his hilarious escapades. However Pac-Man has a mind of his own, and is prone to wandering into danger, so make sure you guide him safely: whether you’re just hanging out in the arcade, hang-gliding or minecart riding! Also there are two full, classic Pac-Man games to discover and enjoy: the original arcade Pac-Man™ and its sequel Ms. Pac-Man™. This is the US version of the game.

PL.name: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™
PL.description: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™ is an innovative interactive cartoon centred around the classic game star and his hilarious escapades. However Pac-Man has a mind of his own, and is prone to wandering into danger, so make sure you guide him safely: whether you’re just hanging out in the arcade, hang-gliding or minecart riding! Also there are two full, classic Pac-Man games to discover and enjoy: the original arcade Pac-Man™ and its sequel Ms. Pac-Man™. This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™
PT.description: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™ é uma inovadora animação interativa, baseada na estrela do clássico dos videojogos e nas suas fugas hilariantes. Pac-Man faz o que quer e tem tendência para ir ao encontro do perigo, por isso tenta orientá-lo para um lugar seguro, quer estejas apenas a descontrair no salão de jogos, a praticar asa-delta ou a conduzir uma vogoneta! Além disso, há dois clássicos completos do Pac-Man para descobrires e te divertires: o jogo de arcade original, Pac-Man™, e a sua sequela, Ms. Pac-Man™. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™
RU.description: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™ — это инновационный, интерактивный мультфильм, сосредоточенный на веселых проделках героя известной классической игры. Однако, у Pac-Man есть своя голова на плечах, и он склонен к самостоятельных действиям, зачастую приводящих к опасным ситуациям. Так что стоит приглядывать за ним, независимо от того, проводите ли вы время в галерее игровых автоматов, занимаетесь ли дельтапланеризмом или катаетесь в вагонетке! Также вам будут доступны две полных классических игры из серии Pac-Man: оригинальная аркада Pac-Man™ и ее продолжение — Ms. Pac-man™. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

SE.name: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™
SE.description: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures™ is an innovative interactive cartoon centred around the classic game star and his hilarious escapades. However Pac-Man has a mind of his own, and is prone to wandering into danger, so make sure you guide him safely: whether you’re just hanging out in the arcade, hang-gliding or minecart riding! Also there are two full, classic Pac-Man games to discover and enjoy: the original arcade Pac-Man™ and its sequel Ms. Pac-Man™. This is the US version of the game.
